title: Quality seed production scenario of Egyptian clover (Trifolium alexandrinum) in India: A 24-year retrospective analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Subhash Chand, Ajoy Kumar Roy, Sanjay Kumar, Tejveer Singh, Vijay Kumar Yadav, Swami Sunil Ramling, Rajiv Kumar Agrawal, Devendra Ram Malaviya, Awnindra Kumar Singh, Ram Vinod Kumar, Krishna Kumar Dwivedi, Amaresh Chandra, Devendra Kumar Yadava
